overview: In a week, Manda will be married. Together with his two best friends, Aul and Dee, they went to Bali for a bridal shower. Accidentally, they meet Bossas, a local youth who likes to fight and cause trouble. Very different from the figure of Dimas, Manda's future husband whose life is straighter.  In just a few days, Manda felt comfortable with Bossas. But Manda knows, everything will not be easy. Moreover, her mother was already looking forward to her wedding later. Manda has a dilemma now. Continuing her marriage, or following her heart. A film about a woman who finds the right person at the wrong time...
title: Bukannya Aku Tidak Mau Nikah
